example.title: Client Events
example.metakeywords: php grid, php ajax grid, php datagrid, php gridview, ajax grid php
example.description: KoolGrid support rich client-side event. There are 2 types of events: "OnBefore..." and "On...". The "OnBefore..." will occur before event is executed and you can return false on handle function to cancel the event. The "On..." will occur after the event is executed.
